scheduler.task.scheduled

Class ScheduledTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduler.task.Task
      • scheduler.task.scheduled.ScheduledTask

  • public class ScheduledTask
extends Task
    This class represents a Task that has been scheduled. It is to be stored in the according TimeTables so that the Schedulables know what Task they need to perform at a certain given TimeSlot.
